p: HAE cultures were infected with SARS-CoV-2 (TCID 50 of 1,000, as assessed for the Vero E6 cells) and fixed at 4 days postinfection with 3.7% paraformaldehyde (PFA) overnight. As controls, HAE cultures were infected with HCoV-NL63 (isolate Amsterdam 1) or HCoV-HKU1 (strain Caen 1) and fixed at 4 days postinfection with 3.7% PFA for 2 h.
